nodes.text: Zeldin was a Dathomirian female Nightsister. According to legend, Zeldin was chosen to use Nightsister magick to infiltrate the mind of the Sith Lord Darth Caldoth, who had stolen a pod containing a dead Nightsister from Dathomir. Zeldin attempted to manipulate Caldoth into causing his own death out of revenge, but Caldoth was aware of Zeldin's presence, exploiting their connection before trapping her consciousness within his mind.
